contribution.

Proficient in AutoCAD Adobe InDesign Adobe Photoshop Concept development Drafting Photography Space planning Product specifications Interior architectural detailing Color and material application Proficient with furniture systems

<JD_START>
Job Title: Sweater Designer

Location: New York, United States

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Art/Creative, Design, Information Technology

Description:
Job title: Sweater Designer

Contract type:

Location: New York

Discipline:

Remote: No

Salary: $80,000/year - $100,00/year

Reference: 463630

Contact name: Sarah Stanley

Job Description

Designer, Women's Sweaters

Client Overview: 

Our client is a celebrated authority in the design and manufacturing of women's clothing. The company is known for its popular brands which are featured in major retailers including Nordstrom, Bloomingdales, Macy’s, Urban Outfitters, and more.

Designer Overview:

As the Sweater Designer, you will be responsible for supporting the Design Director by designing brand right collections to reflect season trends and account needs.

Designer Responsibilities:


 Research the market and put together market/trend research on new silhouettes,


color, and fabrication.


 Work closely with the Design Directors to execute their brand vision Track and organize development samples by following up with factories to ensure


samples are received on time.


 Design, sketch with accurate specifications for fit, construction, fabrication, print, and


color.


 Ensures adherence to the Seasonal Time and Action calendar Source and select the new seasonal fabrics and trims Work closely with suppliers abroad to ensure good execution of design tech packs


and samples


 Maintain the fabric, trim and color library - Ensure fabric library is up to date for


seasonal inspiration and archived fabrics

The ideal candidate will possess the following skills:


 Possess strong knowledge of garment construction. Experience in Sweaters Thorough knowledge of silhouettes, fabrication, construction techniques, and trim Ability to design around concept direction Strong sketching and fast tech packing abilities


Designer Qualifications:


 Level of education: Bachelor's degree in fashion design Work experience: 5+ years design experience- PRIVATE LABEL AND/OR OFF PRICE EXPERIENCE IS PREFERRED Creativity and enthusiasm for fashion Strong organizational skills Ability to multitask, prioritize workloads and handle the pressure of a fast-paced


environment


 Team player with a can-do attitude Proficient in Photoshop, Illustrator, Excel and all other Microsoft Office Applications

Experience Level (if available): Entry level
<JD_END>
